message.body: Did you guys want to go to the same bar tomorrow or a different one?
We are going to Daniels moms house on spring garden. His mom is out of town. You are welcome to come
Thanks for the invitation but i think we're going to go to a bar
Okay buddy
Did you happen to watch the Ghana Germany game? What happened?
I did, the first half was a snoozer but the second half was really crazy back and forth and ended with a 2 2 draw
That is crazy
Muller got his head smashed in on the last play of the game and there was blood everywhere
Do you think we have a chance at beating Germany?
That is awesome
Is he out for awhile
I truly hope so but I'm not sure
Did he take a cleat to the head or what
As far as our chances against them, through the transitive property it is already proved that America can beat Germany. We beat Ghana and they couldn't
He went to head the ball and collided with another guys shoulder but it was really bad because they barreled right into each other
You can probably find pictures of it on the internet. He looked like gg allin with the amount of blood he had on his face
Also there was a pitch invader and he had Nazi stuff written on his torso in market
*marker
They will sew him up and he will probably play against the US
Weird game
And I saw Argentina only beat Iran 1-0
Iran should have won or at least tied that game, they really had the better chances and that missed penalty call
What a day
Yeah, that last game was kind of crummy though
They can't all be shockers
Its true unfortunately. Its crazy, that was only the third or fourth bad game I've seen. I've watched a ton of them and most have been really fun
It's the World Cup, top level players playing as hard as they can
That better be good or the sport is lacking something
Yeah that's true
